name: Travel Sky (ld39 - prototype)
description:
Made for ludum dare 39 with the theme of "Running out of Power". Was not into the theme too much and had little time over this weekend so I just made a small prototype of some air ship crew management game. Since its very unfinished and not that engaging I decided to not submit it for ld39.

Controls:

Mouse - assign crew

W/S - move airship up and down when someone is piloting.

R - reset the game.
